articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
Publications
Expanding the invasion footprint: Ventenata dubia and relationships to wildfire, environment, and plant communities in the Blue Mountains of the Inland Northwest, USA
Another article

Claire Tortorelli
          
          
          Home
          
          
          Research
           
          ▾
          
          
          Community Ecology
          Wildfire & Invasion
          
          
          About
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
          
          
            
              
              Welcome!
              I’m a PhD student researching plant invasions and wildfire at Oregon State University. I use field, remote sensing, and modeling techniques to investigate how plant community traits and environmental characteristics influence community invasion resistance. I collaborate with managers to develop co-produced, actionable science examining how plant invasions influence and respond to landscape-scale wildfire to inform pre- and post-fire management actions.

Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
